Name: The Defenders: The Second Wave
About the game: Fight the ghosts through 50 waves of growing danger. Play as a powerful wizard, a mighty warrior, or a strategic builder to stop the ghost invasion. Evolve your character in the direction you want. Survive until dawn, or die trying. Features: Awesome one to four player hack'n'slashing 50 waves of evil dudes to fight 10+ enemy types, each providing a new challenge 5 big, mean, evil bosses 12 different spells to fight off the enemies 6 tactical things to place to help you in the battle 25 items to buy to improve your defender You can even bring down the moon ... also sheep!
